mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by a lot of mods.

mod.name: TerraFirmaCraft
mod.description: Survival Mode as it should have been.

mod.name: TechNodefirmacraft
mod.description: Custom integration and features for TechNodefirmacraft modpack

mod.name: TerrafirmaStuff
mod.description: Adding blocks to TFC

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: Redefine your rails

mod.name: Forestry for Minecraft
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: PneumaticCraft
mod.description: A technical mod all about pneumatics!

mod.name: Steve's Factory Manager
mod.description: Steve's Factory Manager is a mod which allows you to set up systems that moves and manages items between inventories and machines

mod.name: Steve's Addons
mod.description: Adds extra things to improve SFM

mod.name: Steve's Workshop
mod.description: Adds a modular production table for crafting and smelting

mod.name: Immersive Engineering
mod.description: A retro-futuristic tech mod!

mod.name: Mekanism
mod.description: Energy, Armor, Tools, Weapons, Machines, Magic.

mod.name: MekanismGenerators
mod.description: Generators module of Mekanism.

mod.name: OpenBlocks
mod.description: All the things you never thought you will ever need

mod.name: Hopper Ducts
mod.description: Adds hopper ducts, which are item transport blocks functionally similar to hoppers, but capable of sending items in any direction.

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.authors: Florian 'Sangar' Nuecke,Johannes 'Lord Joda' Lohrer,Everyone who contributed to the mod on Github - thank you!
mod.description: This mod adds modular computers and robots that can be programmed in Lua.

mod.name: JABBA
mod.description: Barrels of fun

mod.name: BetterStorage
mod.description: Adds more storage related blocks and items to the game.

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Ropes+
mod.description: Ropes! Grappling Hook! Various new Arrows to shoot about! Rope Arrows!

mod.name: Decorations
mod.description: Decorations Addon for TFC.

mod.name: In-Game wiki Mod
mod.description: Mod that allows for mods to add in-game documentation.

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware, fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables, enchanted plates, map frames, and seats!

mod.name: BiblioWoodsTFC
mod.description: BiblioWoods TFC edition brings recipes and TFC specific items for BiblioCraft so both mods can be enjoyed together

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: Carepenter's Blocks Custom Textures
mod.description: Carpenter's Blocks Textures and Custom BedSpreads made by fireredlily.

mod.name: Flat Signs
mod.description: FlatSigns provides new sign functionality allowing signs to be placed flat on the ceiling or the floor (via sneak click). You can also make sponges to edit existing signs.

mod.name: Merchants
mod.description: Merchants Addon for TFC.

mod.name: Leather Water Sac
mod.description: It's a water sac made out of leather for TerraFirmaCraft

mod.name: NotEnoughItems
mod.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mod.name: Plant Mega Pack
mod.description: Add a huge variety of real plants

mod.name: TooMuchTime
mod.description: Control over Minecraft's day/night cycle. Customized for TNFC

mod.name: Better Boat
mod.description: This mod fixes several issues with vanilla boats.

mod.name: Tubestuff
mod.description: A collection of blocks that are useful.

mod.name: Ships Mod
mod.description: Build a sailable ship out of blocks

mod.name: AnimalCrate
mod.description: Stick that animal in a Box.

mod.name: PneumaticCrap
mod.description: Extra items for PneumaticCraft

mod.name: Blue Power
mod.description: Work in progress mod aiming to reintroduce some missing 'glue' blocks from prior versions of modded Minecraft

mod.name: QmunityLib
mod.description: Library required by several Qmunity mods

mod.name: TFC Scales
mod.description: Scales for precise food dividing in TerraFirmaCraft

mod.name: Scripts
mod.description: MineTweaker scripts to glue the whole thing together.

mod.name: MineTweaker 3
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: Mod Tweaker 2
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for MineTweaker 3.

mod.name: TFC Tweaker
mod.description: Provides Minetweaker support for Terrafirmacraft 0.79.28+.

mod.name: Meta Mod: Custom Items
mod.description: A simple way to add your custom stuff to minecraft.

mod.name: Mob Properties
mod.description: Allows advanced customization options for all mobs' drops, attributes, and NBT data.

mod.name: Special AI
mod.description: Adds additional AI patterns to mobs to make the game more challenging. 'Passive' mobs will fight back, monsters will break light sources and wooden doors, some mobs gain random extra abilities, and villages are more... village-y.

mod.name: Block Properties
mod.description: Allows advanced customization options for blocks. Based on Mob Properties.

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Resource Loader
mod.description: Allows mod pack creators / users to add their own custom textures to minecrafts resources without making a resource pack.

mod.name: Treecapitator
mod.description: Allows you to chop down entire trees by breaking a single log.

mod.name: Hardcore Questing Mode
mod.description: This mod will add Hardcore mode with extra lives. If you use up your lives, your world will be deleted or you will be banned.

mod.name: Aroma1997Core
mod.description: This is basically a library used by most my other mods.

mod.name: OpenEye
mod.description: User protection, error management and analytics

mod.name: HelpFixer
mod.description: Fixes the help command from mod derpyness

mod.name: Immibis Core
mod.description: This is like CodeChicken Core, Buildcraft Core, RedPower Core, and so on - it provides requirements for other mods.

mod.name: WR-CBE Core
mod.description: Redstone Ether with some component items

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: Required for all CoFH Mods. Also provides some customization options for Minecraft.

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Core library for all ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Needed for ChickenBones mods

mod.name: bspkrsCore
mod.description: Shared classes used in the mods maintained by bspkrs.

mod.name: OpenMods
mod.description: Boring stuff for all that silly Open* mods

mod.name: SanAndreasPs Manager Pack
mod.description: A manager pack made for and required by all my mods.

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.name: Forge Multipart
mod.description: Open source library for facilitation of multiple functional parts in the one block space.

mod.name: FMPIntegration
mod.description: A mod adding FMP integration

mod.name: LiteLoader
mod.description: Library file for loading of .litemod addons.

mod.name: CreativeCore
mod.description: core for Item Physics Lite

mod.name: CommonsCodec
mod.description: Dependency for InpureCore

mod.name: CommonsCompress
mod.description: Dependency for Inpurecore

mod.name: zTNFCResources
mod.description: Provides ore names and textures for custom items.

mod.description: TFC config for length of year

mod.description: TFC config for length of year

mod.description: TFC config for length of year

mod.description: Better chat for SMP play.

mod.name: HQM Quest Line
mod.description: HQM Questline for TNFC

mod.name: FastCraft
mod.description: FastCraft optimizes MineCraft in various ways, visit the homepage for further details and support.

mod.name: AromaBackup
mod.description: This is a small Backup mod I created. All it does: Backups. It also works on clients!

mod.name: MCDiscord client
mod.description: Discord VOIP client for MC

mod.name: WorldBorder
mod.description: Efficient, feature-rich mod for limiting the size of your worlds

mod.name: Farseek
mod.description: Streams lib.

mod.name: Streams
mod.description: This mod introduces real flowing rivers, with a true current, to your Minecraft worlds. Compatible with many terrain generators!

mod.name: INpureCore
mod.description: Culls duplicate and uncraftable items from NEI

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Adds in mod integration into NEI by showing bee breeding information as well as other helpful mod plugins.

mod.name: NEI Integration
mod.description: NEI handlers for all of the mods, one at a time.

mod.name: TerraFirmaCraftNEIplugin
mod.description: TerraFirmaCraft + NEI = <3

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: All your data are belong to us.

mod.name: WAILA Plugins
mod.description: WAILA plugins for various mods, such as Blood Magic, Magical Crops, and Forestry!

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: An add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at

mod.name: Damage Indicators
mod.description: Displays the damage you inflict on creatures, as well as current health, name and potion effects.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use and sorting of items.

mod.name: Macro Keybind Mod
mod.description: A mod to helps with keybinding and adds macros to automate tasks

mod.name: Dynamic Lights
mod.description: Makes the world light up using items in hand.

mod.name: Hardcore Darkness
mod.description: Removes the minimum light that's always present in minecraft.

mod.name: Sound Filters
mod.description: Adds reveb to caves, as well as muted sounds underwater/in lava, and behind walls.

mod.name: Connected Glass
mod.description: Does what you'd expect from a mod called Connected Glass.

mod.name: Better Foliage
mod.description: Leafier leaves and grassier grass

mod.name: ItemPhysic
mod.description: More realistic Itemphyiscs

mod.name: Presence Footsteps for TFC
mod.description: Resource pack modified for TFC by Cirom.

mod.name: Presence Footsteps
mod.description: Presence Footsteps is an overly complicated footstep sound enhancement mod for Minecraft. It changes the way footstep sounds are produced, in addition to a whole new set of sounds.

mod.name: SimpleAutoRun
mod.description: Simple hotkey for Autorun

mod.name: MobiusCore
mod.description: Core mod used for Opis

mod.name: Opis
mod.description: Contextual server profiler

mod.name: MapWriter
mod.description: An open source mini map mod

mod.name: VoxelMap
mod.description: Minimap and Worldmap.Have an overview of your surroundings, or view the entire world. Create waypoints.

mod.name: JourneyMap FairPlay
mod.description: Mini-map client side mod. Suggested that you disable the exporting to browser map function to improve performance.

mod.name: JourneyMap Unlimited
mod.description: Mini-map client side mod and serverside config. Suggested that you disable the exporting to browser map function to improve performance.

mod.name: Localized Weather & Storms
mod.description: Localized rain and storms that evolve into deadly tornadoes and others, also some ambience effects

mod.name: Optifine
mod.description: USE AT OWN RISK. This mod adds support for HD textures and a lot of options for better looks and performance.

mod.name: ScriptW2
mod.description: Script for Weather2

mod.name: ScriptHQM
mod.description: Script for HQM

mod.description: InGame Wiki Data for TechNodefirmaCraft pack
